title: A Different Eden
description: For Eleanor, destiny and desire were inextricably bound. From turn-of-the-century Boston, where an aristocrat's twisted needs forced her to flee...to the treacherous shadows of a rambling Welsh estate, where jealousy and madness consumed all love... Eleanor never surrendered to her dreams. Somehow, she would forge her own path to fulfillment. Somewhere, she would find...A DIFFERENT EDEN
author: Katherine Sinclair
